QuestData.Title: Restoring the Faith
QuestData.Description:
The shattered fragments have been reformed. We are ready to repair the Oathstone.
Go now and help Wrathion complete the repairs.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Wrathion at the Obsidian Throne
QuestData.RewardText: This complicates matters, but I will not be denied what is rightfully mine!

Objectives.Objective: Travel with Wrathion to the Throne
